utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What’s the matter?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Someone on the subway licked my neck! Licked my neck!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh Willie’s still alive!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What are you guys doing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, my mom called, they’re gonna run our engagement announcement in the local paper, so we’re looking for a good picture of us.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oooh, I’m afraid that does not exist.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s not true, there are great pictures of us!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, there are great pictures of you standing next to a guy who’s going like this…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! That’s the creep that you’re with at the Statue of Liberty.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t know what it is, I just can’t take a good picture.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, here’s a great one.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I’m not in that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know, but look at me all tan.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, why don’t you guys go, get portraits done by a professional photographer.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s a good idea! I bet they have one of those wind machines! Y’know…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah that’s great! Next to that, Chandler won’t look so stupid.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler what do you say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, but I should warn you, I’m not going. I’m going.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude, that reverse lay-up! Oh…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How about those three pointers?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Amazing!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And those guys were this close to lettin’ us play this time too.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey look-look, Phoebe’s talking to uh, Cute Coffeehouse Guy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, you guys call him Cute Coffeehouse Guy, we call him Hums While He Pees.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, and we call Ross Lingers In The Bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey you guys, Hums While He Pees just asked me out!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, I thought that guy was married.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: He is! But he’s getting divorced—Ross! Maybe you know him.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s not a club.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, if this guy’s going through a divorce, is it such a good idea to start going out with him?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, divorced men are not bad men!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: They have that on the napkins at the club.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I gotta get back to work.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You don’t have to be back for a half-hour!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah but, my assistant Tag does sit-ups in the office during lunch. Ohh! I could just spread him on a cracker.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Rach, if you have a crush on this guy, why would you hire him? I mean y’know you can’t date him right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no, I know that. I know that. Although, we made a joke that we spend so much time together he should call me his work wife.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Soon he’ll be able to call you, that lady he knew who got fired.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I am not gonna get fired, because I’m not gonna act on it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So you wouldn’t mind if he was dating someone else?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why? Is he? He is! Isn’t he? He’s dating that slut in marketing!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Maybe I should open a divorced men’s club.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Dude that is so sad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I could put uh-uh a basketball court in the back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Could I play?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, no sit-ups today Tag?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: I just did them.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, well drop and give me ten more!

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, I-I had a drink with lunch. Did those cost reports come in?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Yeah, I filled them out last night?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, great could you make me four copies of those?

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Hey Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ahh, hi! Hi! Melissa, what’s up? I’m just uh, about to umm, go out to the store to get some stuff to put in my backpack. Y’know, like dried fruit and granola and stuff. What’s up?

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Umm, is Tag here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. Why?

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Oh, I was gonna talk to him about doing something tonight.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?! Got a little crush on Tag there do ya?

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Well, we’ve been flirting back and forth, but I was hoping that tonight it would turn into something a little more than that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, whoa-whoa easy there Melissa! This ain’t a locker room, okay? But, y’know I remember him saying that-that he had plans tonight.

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Oh no!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah. All right, back to work.

utterance.speaker: Melissa
utterance.content: Hey! Isn’t that Tag’s backpack.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah Melissa, I don’t want to be known as the uh, office bitch, but I will call your supervisor.

utterance.speaker: The Photographer
utterance.content: Great! That’s great Monica! Great! Now, Chandler, you want to give us a smile?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: The Photographer
utterance.content: I’m sorry, is the seat uncomfortable?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, I am.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, listen to me sweetie, I know you can do this. Okay? You have a beautiful smile.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I do?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! All right, maybe you don’t have to smile. Let’s try something else. Let’s try umm, try looking sexy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Or not.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi Joey! What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, well I’ve got an audition down the street and I spilled sauce all over the front of my shirt. You got an extra one?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, sure. Umm…here.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Great. You got anything that’s not Ralph Lauren?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I don’t think so Joe.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, I guess this will be fine.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, listen umm, what-what are you doing tonight?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nothing, why?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How would you feel about taking out my assistant Tag? I’ll pay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Huh, Rach I got to say it’s gonna take a lot of money for me to go out on a date with a dude.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m not asking you to go on a date with him!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really? ‘Cause I could kinda use the money.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, just-just he-he’s new in town and I know he doesn’t have any guy friends. Just take him to like a ball game or something. I’ll really appreciate it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure, no problem. Ooh—Hey, donuts!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know. Let’s try a look…of far off…wonderment. Okay, we’ll-we’ll gaze into our future and we’ll think about our marriage and the days to come. Chandler! What is the matter with your face?! I mean this picture is supposed to say "Geller and Bing to be married," not "Local woman saves drowning moron!" Hey! Don’t laugh at him! He’s my drowning moron!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Aww!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s it! Take it! Take it! Take it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I like this one. It seems to say, "I love you and that’s why I have to kill you."

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: They can’t all be bad. Find the one where you make your bedroom eyes. Ohh, there it is.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God! Those are my bedroom eyes?! Why did you ever sleep with me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you really want to pull at that thread?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m having a really good time!

utterance.speaker: Hums While He Pees
utterance.content: Me too! I’m sorry that guy in the subway licked your neck.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh. No that’s okay, he’s a friend.

utterance.speaker: Hums While He Pees
utterance.content: Hey uh, I don’t mean to be presumptuous but I have these two tickets to the ballroom dancing finals tomorrow night if you want to go?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I… Well y’know I-I mean I missed the-the semi-finals, so I’d just be lost.

utterance.speaker: Hums While He Pees
utterance.content: I know it’s really lame, but I got these tickets from my boss and—Oh no! No! No! My God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, don’t freak out. I’ll go.

utterance.speaker: Hums While He Pees
utterance.content: No it’s… Uh, my ex-wife Whitney is out there. I cannot deal with her right now. That woman is crazy!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, I know. Hold on. Hey Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, umm that’s Whitney , Kyle’s ex-wife out there, now do you think that you can y’know divert her so that we can slip out?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! No!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well okay but I have two tickets to the ballroom dance finals.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I don’t think so Pheebs. All right, I’ll do it. But just because you’re a friend.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi Ginger.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right! I want my key back!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t have it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s right there!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ugh, okay Sherlock!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I’m sorry but you-you-you better go Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, well I just wanted to say thank you though for diverting Kyle’s ex.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah—No—You’re welcome. We’ll talk about it later.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi Whitney.

utterance.speaker: Whitney
utterance.content: Hi Ross! You ready for breakfast?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yep. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Kyle’s ex-wife? You were supposed to divert her not date her!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi! I’m sorry, but can you give me a second while I talk to this woman, who by the way did not spend the night.

utterance.speaker: Whitney
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. I did divert her and we ended up having a great time! Okay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Watching ballroom dancing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes! That’s where we realized we were both super cool people!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well look-look, okay Ross, Kyle just told me some really bad stuff about her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Like what?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Like she’s really mean, and she’s over critical, and-and—No! She will paint a room a really bright color without even checking with you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And! She uses sex as a weapon!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Fine! Thank you for warning me. At breakfast I’ll be on full alert for room painting and sex weapons.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You’re still gonna go out with her?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, didn’t you just hear what I said?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pheebs come on! I mean, consider the source! Of course her ex-husband’s gonna say that stuff. Now, if you’ll excuse me…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No listen to me! She is crazy!

utterance.speaker: Whitney
utterance.content: Uh, your door isn’t sound proof.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You see? Nothing is good enough for her!

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Good morning.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi Tag! Hey, so did you have fun with uh, with Joey last night?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Oh yeah! We went to the Knicks game.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh that’s nice.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Then we went to this bar and he hooked us up with all these women!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wo-women? You mean like old women?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Well kinda old, like 30.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: And I never used to be able to just talk to girls in bars, but I got like 20 phone numbers last night.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s great! Wow man, so Joey must’ve really taught you some stuff huh?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: A little.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: How you doin’?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: See? That’s a great smile! Easy. Natural. Now, pretend I have a camera. You’re changing it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can’t help it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, all right, all right, all right, you wanna know what I do when I take resume shots?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Borrow money from me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, first—first of all, you want to make it look spontaneous. I look down , look down, keep looking down; then I look up. See? All right, now you try. Look down , you’re looking down, keep looking down…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why is there jelly on your shoe?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I had a donut.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So uh, heard you had some fun with Tag last night.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! That guy’s all right!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah and you had fun teaching him how to be all Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y’know, all the women.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey well, you can’t teach someone to be good with women. Y’know, that’s why I never had any luck with Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m right here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, would-would you mind just not going out with him again? Okay, just the idea of you and he and all these women, it’s just—And I know he’s my assistant and I can’t date him—but it just bothers me, all right?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! No-no-no-no, you can’t take him away from me! I got a great partner to pick up girls with! Finally!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m still right here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, will you, will you at least tell him how hollow and unsatisfying this, dating tons of women thing is!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I just don’t want him to meet anybody until I am over my crush—And I will get over it. It’s-it’s not like I love him, it’s just physical! But—I mean I get crushes like this all the time! I mean hell, I had a crush on you when I first met ya!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know, Monica told me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Did you have a crush on me, when you first met me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Sure.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Can you people not see me?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So, will you talk to him?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t know Rach.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, come on! I’ll give you ten free Ralph Lauren shirts.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: One! No ten! You said ten! You can’t take that back!

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Hey Joey, you wanted to talk to me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t know. You uh, you got something for me?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, this is from Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ten. Okay. Now Tag there’s such a thing as to many women.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, for you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! There you are!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: There I am!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, Joey said I uh, I needed to relax so he gave me an antihistamine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, and then I fell asleep on the subway and went all the way to Brooklyn. Brooklyn is f-far!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, what were you thinking?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t know, but don’t worry, don’t worry, because I know how to take a picture now. Okay, see? Look down , look down, look down…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So, how are things going with crazy? Has she cooked your rabbit yet?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Listen, you are hearing one side of the story, okay—and F.Y.I she must’ve shown Kyle over 30 paint samples before she painted that room! And his response to each one was, "I don’t give a tiny rat’s ass."

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah well, maybe she should’ve spent a little less time decorating and a little more time in the bedroom.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I don’t think we are gonna have that problem, but maybe that’s just because I am not emotionally unavailable!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You think he’s emotionally unavailable?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think he can be.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, maybe he wouldn’t be she didn’t bring the office home every night!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, excuse her for knowing what she wants to do with her life!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah well, she certainly knew what she was doing New Year’s Eve 1997.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I knew you were gonna throw that in my face!! That was three years ago! She apologized and she apologized! What more do you want?!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We want the last six years back!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So do we!! So do we!! I’m sorry you had to see that.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Good morning Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Thanks, hey so uh what’d you do last night?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Went out with Joey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah? Another night of birdogging the chickas?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: No. We had a really good talk. I don’t think I’m gonna do that bar scene anymore.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! I did not see that coming.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: It’s just not really who I am. Y'know, I’ve always been happier when…Why am I telling you this? You don’t care about this stuff.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no, yes I do! I do! I mean, come on go on, you were, you were saying I am happier when uh, y’know?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: When I’m in a relationship, I love having a girlfriend.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Someone I can spoil, y’know?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sp-spoil?

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Uh-huh! Let me ask you something?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: Do you believe that there is one perfect person for everyone?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I-I’m startin’ too.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: And if that person is already in your life, you should do something about it right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes! Hell yes!

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: All right then, it’s settled.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: I’m gettin’ back together with my ex-girlfriend.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’d love to!

utterance.speaker: Tag
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello?! Oh, yeah! This is gonna be a while. Excuse me. Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: My God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I’m sorry. Is that annoying? And speaking about being selfish in bed, how’s Whitney?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well maybe she wouldn’t have to be selfish in bed if someone else knew where everything was!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh he knows! For the most part.

utterance.speaker: Kyle
utterance.content: Oh hey! Good, you’re both here.

utterance.speaker: Whitney
utterance.content: We kinda need to talk.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Both of you together?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wh-what’s up?

utterance.speaker: Whitney
utterance.content: Well, I went over to Kyle’s last night to pick up a few things and we got to reminiscing…

utterance.speaker: Kyle
utterance.content: …we talked through most of the night and we realized that the reason we were so angry at each other was because there are still feelings there. So…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh just say it Kyle!

utterance.speaker: Kyle
utterance.content: We’re gonna give it another try.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What about her whining and her constant need for attention?!

utterance.speaker: Whitney
utterance.content: I’m gonna work on that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh right, because you’re so capable of change.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know, he hums when he pees!

utterance.speaker: Whitney
utterance.content: I do know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It makes him miss the bowl, but whatever.

utterance.speaker: Whitney
utterance.content: We’re so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s all right, we-we don’t need you. In fact, hey I’m over it already.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, and y’know what? I don’t give a tiny rat’s ass.

utterance.speaker: Kyle
utterance.content: Yeah, we’re gonna go.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m sorry. Ugh, Pheebs, you were, you were right about her. Y’know, she did try to use sex as a weapon! Yeah, I hurt my back a little.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh. Y’know, he hums while he does other stuff to.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, were better off without them.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And y’know, even if they break up again, you’d better not let him in your sad men’s club!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Divorced men’s club.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Potato, Potaato.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey guys check it out! My mom sent me the paper!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, let’s see it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ahhh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah, that looks good.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, we look great together.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, we really do!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! Imagine what our kids would look like!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y’know, we don’t have to imagine.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m marrying her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We’ll just see.
